an3.104:1.1: “Lokassaham, bhikkhave, assadapariyesanam acarim. Yo loke assado tadajjhagamam.
an3.104:1.2: Yavatako loke assado, pannaya me so sudittho.
an3.104:1.3: Lokassaham, bhikkhave, adinavapariyesanam acarim. Yo loke adinavo tadajjhagamam.
an3.104:1.4: Yavatako loke adinavo, pannaya me so sudittho.
an3.104:1.5: Lokassaham, bhikkhave, nissaranapariyesanam acarim. Yam loke nissaranam tadajjhagamam.
an3.104:1.6: Yavatakam loke nissaranam, pannaya me tam sudittham.
an3.104:1.7: Yavakivancaham, bhikkhave, lokassa assadanca assadato adinavanca adinavato nissarananca nissaranato yathabhutam nabbhannasim, neva tavaham, bhikkhave, sadevake loke samarake sabrahmake sassamanabrahmaniya pajaya sadevamanussaya ‘anuttaram sammasambodhim abhisambuddho’ti paccannasim.
an3.104:1.8: Yato ca khvaham, bhikkhave, lokassa assadanca assadato adinavanca adinavato nissarananca nissaranato yathabhutam abbhannasim, athaham, bhikkhave, sadevake loke samarake sabrahmake sassamanabrahmaniya pajaya sadevamanussaya ‘anuttaram sammasambodhim abhisambuddho’ti paccannasim.
an3.104:1.10: ‘akuppa me vimutti, ayamantima jati, natthi dani punabbhavo’”ti.
